summary: This module assembles and configures the Flask web application that powers CKAN. It defines a custom Flask subclass with request hooks, a session manager for communicating with the CKAN portal, a context‑global container for per‑request data, and middleware that applies locale settings. It also includes utilities for registering core and plugin blueprints, handling errors, managing web assets, CSRF protection, and other request‑level concerns.
business_intent: Provide a fully‑featured Flask application stack tailored for CKAN, handling authentication, internationalisation, plugin integration, error reporting, and static asset delivery so that the CKAN data portal can serve web requests reliably and securely.
